title: "Surprisingly Smart Artificial Intelligence Sheds Light on How the Brain Processes Language"
excerpt: "Neuroscientists find the internal workings of next-word prediction models resemble those of language-processing centers in the brain. In the past few years, artificial intelligence models of language have become very good at certain tasks."
